ndfr

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ndfr.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This class display the server screen and also perform server functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server()
      Create the application.

    • Method Summary

      • addToChecksumList

        public void addToChecksumList(java.lang.String clientIpAddress,
                     java.lang.String fileName,
                     java.lang.String checksum)
        Adds a file name along with the checksum and IP address of the client to the list of checksums. If checksum already exists, it will add the checksum to the duplicateChecksum list.
        Parameters:
        clientIpAddress - The IP address of the client
        fileName - The name of the file
        checksum - The checksum of the file

      • clientFinishedSending

        public void clientFinishedSending()

      • addToLog

        public void addToLog(java.lang.String text)
        This just adds text to the log
        Parameters:
        text - Takes a line of text to add to the log

      • getLog

        public java.lang.String getLog()
        Gets the text from the log
        Returns:
        The log

      • exportLog

        public void exportLog()
        This will save the log to a file

      • generateReport

        public void generateReport()
        This will populate the clientDuplicates HashMap, it will put every client as the key, and a Vector list of files as the value. It will also start the ClientWriterThread for each client

      • showReport

        public void showReport()
